```{r}
#| label: read data
#| echo: false

data <- read.csv("data/data.csv")

new_cname <- gsub("\\.", "_", colnames(data))
data2 <- data
colnames(data2) <- new_cname

data_links <- read.csv("data/sc_bench_benchmark_links.csv")
colnames(data_links)[1] <- "Paper_title"

ojs_define(paper_data=data2)
```
